new_skill_specs.name: extract_roughness_values_from_image
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract roughness values for materials from an image.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A dictionary with material names as keys and their roughness values as floats.
edge_cases: Image does not contain roughness values

new_skill_specs.name: compare_roughness_values
new_skill_specs.purpose: Compare roughness values to determine if Coral is the roughest.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A string 'A' if Coral is the roughest, otherwise 'B'.
edge_cases: All materials have the same roughness
Coral is not listed in the dictionary
